review: This product is wonderful and has changed our viewing habits. I can always find an interesting event to watch and enjoy on my own time. I am no longer tethered to TV schedules and faced with choices of dull and uninteresting programs. We have "cut the cord" to cable TV, saving us more than $120 per month.  We get our news and weather from the computer without having to watch dozens of car commercials and furniture ads.And I can find movies and favorite TV shows whenever I wish, any time of day or night.This device is so simple and easy to use that there is no need for a manual.  When our children and grandchildren visit, they always find programs that they can enjoy together and are not stuck face down into a cell phone.The price is extremely inexpensive and worth its weight in gold. As a long time Prime Member, not only do we get free shipping from Amazon, we  get access to the best programming available. Get this and you will not be disappointed.
author: Don in South Carolina
